data.name: HERADÔNIA Director's cut
data.detailed_description:
"HERADÕNIA" is a first-person psychological horror game, FOCUSED ON STORY.

Play as Julia, a simple woman who lives in Heradônia, with her husband who works in the city police department and their daughter Ana.
One day after returning from work, she realizes that her house is not the way it left it and her husband is not in town and her daughter has disappeared.


On a certain day, Julia arrives home after a day at work and finds a note from her husband informing her that she had to make a last minute transfer to another state and would only return the next day and would not be able to pick Ana up from school.
When Julia goes to pick up her daughter, she soon realizes that her daughter has disappeared.



  • Explore, find items, notes and clues that led you to your daughter.
  • Control a mother of a family with no combat skills.
  • Use an iron bar to protect yourself from enemies.
data.about_the_game:

Play as Julia, a simple woman who lives in Heradônia, with her husband who works in the city police department and their daughter Ana.
One day after returning from work, she realizes that her house is not the way it left it and her husband is not in town and her daughter has disappeared.


On a certain day, Julia arrives home after a day at work and finds a note from her husband informing her that she had to make a last minute transfer to another state and would only return the next day and would not be able to pick Ana up from school.
When Julia goes to pick up her daughter, she soon realizes that her daughter has disappeared.



  • Explore, find items, notes and clues that led you to your daughter.
  • Control a mother of a family with no combat skills.
  • Use an iron bar to protect yourself from enemies.
data.short_description: Despair seizes a mother's heart when she finds her daughter gone.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Amd Phenom II x4 975 Processor - or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RADEON R5 230 2GB DDR3 64 BITS - or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel I5 2400 3.1ghz, Turbo 3.4ghz - or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 550, 2GB - or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: AMD Athlon(tm) II X4 640 Processor - or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD ATI Radeon HD 7450 2GB VGA
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent - or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 550, 2GB - or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains scenes of explicit violence and gore.
